casebody.data:
No. 495,

Misc.

Hatler, General Chairman of General Grievance Committee of the Brotherhood of Railroad Trainmen, Hudson & Manhattan Railroad Co., et al. v. Dawson, U. S. District Judge, et al. Arnóld B. Elkind for Hatler, petitioner. William W. Golub for Stichman, Trustee, in opposition.

Motion for leave to file petition for writs of mandamus and certiorari denied.
